policyP1: We process your personal data (name, contact details, booking details and requests) for the purpose of handling your reservation enquiry, pre-arrival communication and compliance with legal obligations (e.g., registration, invoicing).
policyP2: The legal basis is performance of a contract or steps prior to entering a contract, and our legitimate interests in operating our accommodation. Data may be shared with payment providers, property management systems, and competent authorities when required by law.
policyP3: You have the right to access, rectify, erase, or restrict processing of your data, and to object where applicable. Contact: zakopanezofiowka@gmail.com. Learn more about retention periods and processors in the full policy below.
introSubtitle: PLAN YOUR STAY AT WILLA ZOFIÓWKA
introTitle: Book your escape to the Tatra Mountains
introText: Experience the warmth and authenticity of Zakopane in a setting where regional tradition meets understated luxury. Reserve your preferred suite directly with us for the best available rates and personal service — your alpine retreat awaits at Willa Zofiówka. Prices may vary. Prices are based on availability, number of adults/children, and the duration of your stay. Every direct reservation gets 20% off.
